welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Suchteln, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights, featuring modern amenities and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 3 hours per day after watching a short advertisement.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
